name: arduino-lab-micropython-ide
description:
Arduino Lab for MicroPython is a project sponsored by Arduino, based on original work by Murilo Polese.
This is an experimental pre-release software, please direct any questions exclusively to Github issues.

scripts.build: npm run post-set-shell && electron-builder $(if [ $(uname -m) =  arm64 ]; then echo --mac --x64; fi)
scripts.postinstall: npm run post-set-shell && npm run rebuild
